pages.text: $(li)The Lukewarm Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Ocean$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this place is composed mainly of Sand blocks.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation here like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Cods, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l), Tropical Fish, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/dolphin)Dolphins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whales$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/hammerhead_shark)Hammerhead Sharks$(/l) can be found here too.
